SRONNodePlugin - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins
The class SRONNodePlugin implements a plug-in that creates a ring overlay network over a set of components.
SRONNodePlugin(int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.SRONNodePlugin
create a new overlay network plug-in instance which will create and use a pool of threads on the owner component with the given number of threads.
StandardMessage - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins
The class StandardMessage implements a standard message that can be sent over the ring overlay network.
StandardMessage(String) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.StandardMessage
create a message with the given prefix for its URI and no payload.
StandardMessage(String, Serializable) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.plugins.StandardMessage
create a message with the given prefix for its URI and the given payload.
